features: New app icon! (so many of you told us you loved the Hermit Crab!)
Lots of internal updates for long-term stability; please update immediately if you are using KitKat. This is the last KitKat release and will only be available for a limited time.
To comply with international law (EU GDPR), we need to ask you to accept the Terms of Use to continue using the app. No changes to the actual policies.
Use any external Download Manager for files
Site Search is now accessible from the Quick Settings sidebar even in Frameless mode
Fixed subtle bugs when creating Lite Apps with custom names
See the full list at https://hermit.chimbori.com/changes
